alert.note: Alert for Lower Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 8:34PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hunterdon, northwestern Mercer, southwestern Somerset and east central Bucks Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 834 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Hope, or 12 miles northwest of Trenton, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ewing, Princeton, Flemington, Pennington, New Hope, Hopewell, Stockton, Washington Crossing, Skillman, Sergeantsville, Cloverhill, Lawrenceville, Sand Brook, Lambertville, Princeton North and Princeton Junction. This includes Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 72 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
